mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ZZ_LOCATION ( SEQ,ID_CODE,CELL,NAME,BIZ_ADDR,HOME_ADDR,PER_ADDR,APPLY_ADDR,OTH_ADDR,FLAG_LOCATION, LOCATION_BIZ_ADDR1,LOCATION_BIZ_ADDR2,LOCATION_BIZ_ADDR3,LOCATION_BIZ_ADDR4,LOCATION_BIZ_ADDR5, LOCATION_HOME_ADDR1,LOCATION_HOME_ADDR2,LOCATION_HOME_ADDR3,LOCATION_HOME_ADDR4, LOCATION_HOME_ADDR5,LOCATION_PER_ADDR1,LOCATION_PER_ADDR2,LOCATION_PER_ADDR3, LOCATION_PER_ADDR4,LOCATION_PER_ADDR5,LOCATION_APPLY_ADDR1,LOCATION_APPLY_ADDR2, LOCATION_APPLY_ADDR3,LOCATION_APPLY_ADDR4,LOCATION_APPLY_ADDR5,LOCATION_OTH_ADDR1, LOCATION_OTH_ADDR2,LOCATION_OTH_ADDR3,LOCATION_OTH_ADDR4,LOCATION_OTH_ADDR5 ) VALUES( #{SEQ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ID_CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{CELL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{BIZ_ADDR,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{HOME_ADDR,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PER_ADDR,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{APPLY_ADDR,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{OTH_ADDR,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FLAG_LOCATION,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{LOCATION_BIZ_ADDR1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LOCATION_BIZ_ADDR2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{LOCATION_BIZ_ADDR3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LOCATION_BIZ_ADDR4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{LOCATION_BIZ_ADDR5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LOCATION_HOME_ADDR1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{LOCATION_HOME_ADDR2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LOCATION_HOME_ADDR3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{LOCATION_HOME_ADDR4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LOCATION_HOME_ADDR5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{LOCATION_PER_ADDR1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LOCATION_PER_ADDR2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{LOCATION_PER_ADDR3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LOCATION_PER_ADDR4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{LOCATION_PER_ADDR5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LOCATION_APPLY_ADDR1, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{LOCATION_APPLY_ADDR2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LOCATION_APPLY_ADDR3, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{LOCATION_APPLY_ADDR4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LOCATION_APPLY_ADDR5, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{LOCATION_OTH_ADDR1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LOCATION_OTH_ADDR2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{LOCATION_OTH_ADDR3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LOCATION_OTH_ADDR4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{LOCATION_OTH_ADDR5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
